metadata.title: CVE-2020-13250 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise include an HTTP API (introduced in1.2.0) and DNS (introduced in 1.4.3) caching feature that was vulnerable todenial of service. Fixed in 1.6.6 and 1.7.4.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13250` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

consul - 1.10.12+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: consul package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.12+dfsg1-1').
